name: Rickshaw Highway Racer: Tuk Tuk In The Rush
name_original: Rickshaw Highway Racer: Tuk Tuk In The Rush
description:
Race on a speedy Tuk Tuk Rickshaw in heavy traffic condition and enjoy one of the most addictive 3D racing game! The aim in Rickshaw Highway Racer: Tuk Tuk in the Rush is to finish the mission as fast as possible. See how quickly you can do it and perform some fantastic stunts on the way!
You can wreck traffic while speeding on highway or burnout by exploding your tuk tuk. Dynamic change of day and night gives you an opportunity to travel at any time of the day. At night, you will feel the realism of the present, which will give you our racing simulator. Tuk Tuk Traffic Racer is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade racing. Drive your Tuk Tuk through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your TUK TUK and buy new ones .Rickshaw Highway Racer: Tuk Tuk in the Rush is a racing simulator on the highway with heavy truck traffic.
You must use all of your Racing and dodging skills in Rickshaw Highway Racer: Tuk Tuk in the Rush to reach the end of the Race. You’ll need quick reactions and nifty fingers, as there are many opposition players trying to take you down. Think you can dodge your way to the end zone. Fasten your seat belt, and let’s get running and Drive along fast traffic and perform stunts. The game is best for fast action traffic rider around the world!
